attributes.action: Honour Shane Williams For His Services To Sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After breaking the welsh try scoring record of 40 tries against France on 15th March 2008 and dazzling many fans with his skills for years, I believe that Shane Williams deserves an honour of some kind in the next round of honours.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office Ceremonial Secretariat is now actively seeking direct applications for honours. Please visit http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
